data.text: -Porzingis! [ Cheers and applause ]

data.text: You're so much fun.

translation.text: Bạn rất vui

data.text: And Kevin Durant gave you a nickname,

data.text: -I love going to the Garden. I love seeing the games.

title: Kristaps Porzingis Was Confused by Kevin Durant's Nickname for Him
